level.heading: Borrower to receive memorandum of loan transaction.
level.text: Every pawnbroker shall, at the time of each loan, deliver to the person pawning or pledging any goods, article, or thing a memorandum or note, signed by him, containing the substance of the entry required to be made in his or her book by § 47-2884.11, excepting as to the description of the person and no charge shall be made or received by any pawnbroker for any such entry, memorandum, or note.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted this subchapter into law.
